181.movie_plot: In a dystopian future, Joseph Dredd, the most famous Judge (a police officer with instant field judiciary powers), is convicted for a crime he did not commit and must face his murderous counterpart.

193.movie_plot: An update of the original film with new interpretations of great works of classical music.

212.movie_plot: Mel Brooks' parody of the classic vampire story and its famous film adaptations.

213.movie_plot: A young boy tells three stories of horror to distract a witch who plans to eat him.

180.movie_plot: A Phoenix secretary embezzles $40,000 from her employer's client, goes on the run, and checks into a remote motel run by a young man under the domination of his mother.

192.movie_plot: A man raised in the jungle by apes falls in love with a wealthy American heiress.

200.movie_plot: Young Indian man Thomas is a nerd in his reservation, wearing oversize glasses and telling everyone stories no-one wants to hear. His parents died in a fire in 1976, and Thomas was saved by...

132.movie_plot: An idiotic man struggles to make it through life on his own in St. Louis.

91.movie_plot: Mike Nelson and his robot companions watch and give their comments about This Island Earth (1955).

84.movie_plot: The Robinson family was going into space to fight for a chance for humanity. Now they are fighting to live long enough to find a way home.

25.movie_plot: After the death of a friend, a writer recounts a boyhood journey to find the body of a missing boy.

30.movie_plot: A police officer is brought out of suspended animation in prison to pursue an old ultra-violent nemesis who is loose in a non-violent future society.

32.movie_plot: A weatherman finds himself inexplicably living the same day over and over again.

143.movie_plot: During a cryogenics test, a pilot frozen in 1939 awakes in 1992 but time is running out, as his body starts to age rapidly.

48.movie_plot: After a space merchant vessel perceives an unknown transmission as a distress call, its landing on the source moon finds one of the crew attacked by a mysterious lifeform, and they soon realize that its life cycle has merely begun.

64.movie_plot: "The Dude" Lebowski, mistaken for a millionaire Lebowski, seeks restitution for his ruined rug and enlists his bowling buddies to help get it.

148.movie_name: I Know What You Did Last Summer (1997)

130.movie_plot: A young woman is forced to fulfill her destiny of fighting vampires and demons with the help of her friends all the while struggling to live a normal teenage life of heart break and drama.

37.movie_plot: The aliens are coming and their goal is to invade and destroy Earth. Fighting superior technology, mankind's best weapon is the will to survive.

98.movie_plot: As Earth is invaded by alien tripod fighting machines, one family fights for survival.

156.movie_name: Escape from the Planet of the Apes (1971)

137.movie_plot: A pharmaceutical scientist creates a pill that makes people remember their happiest memory, and although it's successful, it has unfortunate side effects.

27.movie_plot: A video game based on Terminator 2: Judgment Day (1991).

42.movie_plot: A blade runner must pursue and try to terminate four replicants who stole a ship in space and have returned to Earth to find their creator.

60.movie_plot: A high school teacher's personal life becomes complicated as he works with students during the school elections, particularly with an obsessive overachiever determined to become student body president.

157.movie_plot: A starship crew goes to investigate the silence of a planet's colony only to find two survivors and a deadly secret that one of them has.

134.movie_plot: In 1978, a boy travels 8 years into the future and has an adventure with an intelligent, wisecracking alien ship.

108.movie_name: Star Trek III: The Search for Spock (1984)
108.movie_plot: Admiral Kirk and his bridge crew risk their careers stealing the decommissioned Enterprise to return to the restricted Genesis planet to recover Spock's body.

67.movie_plot: A 16-year-old girl visits her gay half-brother and ends up seducing his boyfriend, thus wreaking havoc on all of their lives.

146.movie_plot: When an expedition to the African Congo ends in disaster, a new team is assembled to find out what went wrong.

145.movie_plot: When Eleanor, Theo, and Luke decide to take part in a sleep study at a huge mansion they get more than they bargained for when Dr. Marrow tells them of the house's ghostly past.

54.movie_plot: The X-Men send Wolverine to the past in a desperate effort to change history and prevent an event that results in doom for both humans and mutants.

24.movie_name: Day the Earth Stood Still, The (1951)
24.movie_plot: A remake of the 1951 classic science fiction film about an alien visitor and his giant robot counterpart who visit Earth.

159.movie_plot: A man struggles with memories of his past, including a wife he cannot remember, in a nightmarish world with no sun.

59.movie_plot: A civilian diving team is enlisted to search for a lost nuclear submarine and face danger while encountering an alien aquatic species.

94.movie_plot: An interstellar teleportation device, found in Egypt, leads to a planet with humans resembling ancient Egyptians who worship the god Ra.

65.movie_plot: The extracurricular king of Rushmore preparatory school is put on academic probation.

152.movie_name: Superman IV: The Quest for Peace (1987)
152.movie_plot: The Man of Steel crusades for nuclear disarmament and meets Lex Luthor's latest creation, Nuclear Man.

58.movie_plot: Three former parapsychology professors set up shop as a unique ghost removal service.

89.movie_plot: A living puppet, with the help of a cricket as his conscience, must prove himself worthy to become a real boy.

163.movie_plot: Kermit, Gonzo and Fozzie are reporters who travel to Britain to interview a rich victim of jewel thieves and help her along with her secretary, Miss Piggy.

86.movie_plot: A naive man comes out into the world after spending 35 years in a nuclear fallout shelter.

15.movie_plot: The story of James Braddock, a supposedly washed-up boxer who came back to become a champion and an inspiration in the 1930s.

126.movie_name: Willy Wonka and the Chocolate Factory (1971)
126.movie_plot: Charlie receives a golden ticket to a factory, his sweet tooth wants going into the lushing candy, it turns out there's an adventure in everything.

17.movie_name: Star Wars: Episode IV - A New Hope (1977)
17.movie_plot: Luke Skywalker joins forces with a Jedi Knight, a cocky pilot, a Wookiee and two droids to save the galaxy from the Empire's world-destroying battle-station while also attempting to rescue Princess Leia from the evil Darth Vader.

116.movie_plot: A "typical" day in the life of The Beatles, including many of their famous songs.

57.movie_plot: Ichabod Crane is sent to Sleepy Hollow to investigate the decapitations of 3 people with the culprit being the legendary apparition, the Headless Horseman.

109.movie_name: Star Trek IV: The Voyage Home (1986)
109.movie_plot: To save Earth from an alien probe, Admiral James T. Kirk and his fugitive crew go back in time to San Francisco in 1986 to retrieve the only beings who can communicate with it: humpback whales.

107.movie_name: Star Trek: The Wrath of Khan (1982)
107.movie_plot: With the assistance of the Enterprise crew, Admiral Kirk must stop an old nemesis, Khan Noonien Singh, from using the life-generating Genesis Device as the ultimate weapon.
